Name: San Francisco Sandwich Company
Review Text: Highly recommend the San Francisco sandwich company.  Beautiful freshly prepared sandwiches, very friendly atmosphere.  Very reasonable price.

Name: San Francisco Sandwich Company
Review Text: We had two sandwiches and a coffee for breakfast. It was very delicious and the price was totally reasonable for the amount of food we got! It’s not a tourist trap like other stores, the prices are visibly declared and there are no bad …

Review Text: excellent! the sandwich and the quality of ingredients are perfect. the price is really good. the owner was very nice person. I would like to visit this place again.

Name: San Francisco Sandwich Company
Review Text:
Came here in 2018 a few times and returned in Aug 2021 as its really good for the price and city(food in Amsterdam isnt great in general).
Will go out of my way to return on my next visit as well.

Name: San Francisco Sandwich Company
Review Text: The owner has created a lovely boutique sandwich bar, great bagels and sandwiches and has just started doing an English breakfast. Make sure you try the banana loaf, so light and full of flavour. Hats off on creating a lovely little cafe with great food and high quality.
